title: Unsafe re-entry ruins someone's race :(
reason: Drivers on the racing surface have the right-of-way.  You must wait for a clear gap before re-entering.

title: Is this unsafe rejoin reportable?
reason: Hold your brakes and join safely when traffic has passed.  Don't try to jump back into the race immediately

title: It was definitely a lunge but Iâ€™m unsure if it was illegal or not
reason: t the car ahead of you was already turning in, and you had no significant overlap with them. At that point they have no obligation to leave you space.

title: I Am The White Acura That Get's Punted
Is anyone to blame for this? was it preventable?
ruling: Car A did not anticipate or react to the cars in front of him and did not react to the car in front braking for the car in front of him.
reason: Car A did not brake in time.
